info.title: Hyarcade API
info.description:
# Introduction
 This is backend api for all Hyarcade systems
 [Hyarcade](https://hyarcade.xyz/) - [GitHub Repo](https://github.com/eatmyvenom/hyarcade)
## Limits
 Any IP address has a default rate limit of 120 requests per minute.

### Response Format
 Responses are served in JSON format.

# Authentication

<!-- ReDoc-Inject: <security-definitions> -->

Api Key.name: key
Api Key.description: Not needed in most use cases, the rate limits are 120/minute per IP. If you want to use more than that contact eatmyvenom.

Database Pass.name: authorization
Database Pass.description: A key to use internal systems and override rate limits, meant for any companion systems like Arcade Bot.

RateLimited.description: A request limit has been reached, this can be due to the limit on the IP address being hit.

MissingPage.description: The page provided does not exist.

items.description: UUID of the player in a dashed format

id.description: The unique identifier for this item

material.description: The Bukkit material enum value for the item

tier.description: The rarity tier of the item

color.description: The color metadata to be applied to an item, usually leather armor pieces

skin.description: The skin value for a skull based item

Game.description: Information about a specific game. When a field is not present you should fallback to the provided default if there is one, required fields will always exist.

id.description: The backend ID of the game.

name.description: The display name of the game.

databaseName.description: The key used for database storage, such as for stats.

modeNames.description: A map of mode key to display name

retired.description: True if the game is retired and no longer playable.

legacy.description: True if the game is legacy and part of the Classic Lobby.

get.summary: Data of a specific player, including game stats
The friends of a specific player
The recently played games of a specific player
The current online status of a specific player
Retrieve a Guild by a player, id, or name
Ranked SkyWars data of a specific player

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the player you wish to request

key.description: A key built with the current month and year.

position.description: The position of the player on the leaderboards, this is not zero indexed and is the display position.

score.description: The current score of the player for this season.

404.description: No data could be found for the requested player.

get.description: Returns information about Hypixel Games. This endpoint is in early development and we are working to add more information when possible HypixelDev/PublicAPI#197

games.description: A map where the key is the backend name of the game

get.description: Information regarding the current mayor and ongoing election in SkyBlock

current.description: Data regarding the current election, will not be provided if there is no open election ongoing

get.summary: Request auction(s) by the auction UUID, player UUID, or profile UUID.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The auction UUID that you wish to request

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The player UUID that you wish to request

parameters.name: profile
parameters.description: The profile UUID that you wish to request

get.description: SkyBlock auctions which ended in the last 60 seconds.

Returns the list of products along with their sell summary, buy summary and quick status.
 ### Product Description
 The returned product info has 3 main fields:
 - `buy_summary`
 - `sell_summary`
 - `quick_status`

`buy_summary` and `sell_summary` are the current top 30 orders for each transaction type (in-game example: [Stock of Stonks](https://i.imgur.com/SjRONxq.png)).

`quick_status` is a computed summary of the live state of the product (used for advanced mode view in the bazaar):
- `sellVolume` and `buyVolume` are the sum of item amounts in all orders.
 - `sellPrice` and `buyPrice` are the weighted average of the top 2% of orders by volume.
 - `movingWeek` is the historic transacted volume from last 7d + live state.
 - `sellOrders` and `buyOrders` are the count of active orders.
SkyBlock profile data, such as stats, objectives etc. The data returned can differ depending on the players in-game API settings.
